page.title: 20Credits
page.content: The project has been undertaken by Class One of Culmstock County Primary School.The children are aged between eight and eleven years. The work was organised and directed by Mrs. Jennifer Heath as part of the environmental studies work during the Summer Term of 1985. Considerable help has been given to the children by the residents of Culmstock who have responded with enthusiasm to the questioning and probing throughout the survey. Particular mention should be made of Mr.and Mrs.Coles,Mr.and Mrs.Channon, Mr.and Mrs.Coombes,Mrs.Symons,Mr. and Mrs.Churchill,Mr.Smith,Mr.Strawbridge, and Sharon Holloway. Transport and adult guidance has been freely given by Mesdames Broom,Hopper, Perkins and Pyle. Final editing by Mr.M.Waine (Head).
